meanings.definition: The state or quality of being fleshy.
meanings.sent1: Her fleshinesses made her look healthy and strong.
meanings.sent2: The baby's fleshinesses were adorable and chubby.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated fleshinesses added humor to the show.
meanings.sent4: The artist captured the essence of fleshinesses in the sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The chef's dish emphasized the fleshinesses of the meat.

meanings.definition: The amount of flesh on a person's body.
meanings.sent1: His fleshinesses indicated a well-fed lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: She was self-conscious about her fleshinesses after the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The tailor had to adjust the dress to accommodate her fleshinesses.
meanings.sent4: The mirror reflected the stark reality of his fleshinesses.
meanings.sent5: The doctor advised him to monitor his fleshinesses for health reasons.

meanings.definition: The presence of flesh or fat in food.
meanings.sent1: The richness of the dish came from the fleshinesses of the meat.
meanings.sent2: The chef carefully trimmed the excess fleshinesses from the steak.
meanings.sent3: The dessert's unexpected fleshinesses surprised the guests.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the stew hinted at the delicious fleshinesses within.
meanings.sent5: The recipe called for reducing the fleshinesses to enhance the flavors.
